name: Shell Alexia 140
category: Engine Oils - Cylinder and System Lubes

localDocs.name: Alexia 140 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.6 21-DEC-2021

marketing: Shell Alexia 140 is also ideal for use in on board cylinder oil mixing systems in combination with lower BN Shell Alexia cylinder oil products or Shell Melina system oils. This offers ultimate flexibility to lubricate most demanding engines run across a broad range of sulphur fuel levels and operating conditions.
